property.name: subtitle
property.value: Lets get this part out of the way.

property.name: description
property.value: To many things to do, need to find a trader so lets get on that right away!

property.name: description
property.value: A base is one of the best ways to protect yourself from the hordes of zombies. Get something more than a few blocks built and some doors.

property.name: offer
property.value: If you scratch my back I'll scratch yours. Get started biulding a base and help protect the region. This way I can focus on trades rather than developing the area.

property.name: completion_key
property.value: Well Damn! You sure can build. Lets see if you can keep that up. Here is some incentive.

property.name: description
property.value: Good job, more to do, go go go.

property.name: completion_key
property.value: Well Damn! You sure can build. Lets see if you can keep that up. Here is some incentive.

property.name: description
property.value: On a damn role! Keep that flow going and those zombies will be minced meat pie!

property.name: completion_key
property.value: Well Damn! You sure can build. Lets see if you can keep that up. Here is some incentive.

property.name: description
property.value: A base is one of the best ways to protect yourself from the hordes of zombies. Build a wood door and some bars and put them on your base!

property.name: completion_key
property.value: Well Damn! You sure can build. Lets see if you can keep that up. Here is some incentive.

property.value: A base is one of the best ways to protect yourself from the hordes of zombies.

property.value: Well Damn! You sure can build. Lets see if you can keep that up. Here is some incentive.

property.name: description
property.value: Upgrading blocks is a major part of the ongoing evolving base!

property.name: offer
property.value: Upgrade as many of the various types of blocks as you can. The more that is out there refined specificially for our endeavors is great for the community and will certainly make us more resilient against those zombies!

property.name: completion_key
property.value: So many blocks! Your head square yet? Here are some goods I had laying around to keep you on this block headed mission!

property.name: subtitle
property.value: Go to area marked and start building a base

property.name: description
property.value: We need to expand our protected area, get some supplies and then go to the marked area and start to build a second base.

property.name: offer
property.value: Get a second base built at the marked location

property.name: completion_key
property.value: We're expanding! In no time we will have an empire to sell to!

property.name: subtitle
property.value: Go to area marked and start building a base

property.name: description
property.value: Wonderful addition, lets keep this up and get more locations ready.
